name: Rocktopus
description:
Dive into a beautiful ocean of stop motion sea creatures and use eight of your fingers to control the eight legs of a xylophonic octopus. 'Rocktopus' is a music game with no rhythm required that works with QWERTY, AZERTY, and Dvorak keyboards. It was made for Stop Motion Jam 2020 with RAD studio, play dough, googly eyes, Fruit Loops, feathers, and artificial bacon bits. The jellyfish are real jelly!

Please Note: If you experience glitches in full screen or with a large window, try the game in its original size (360 x 640 pixels).
